text: R&B; Transmogrification is an album by the American indie band Quasi. It was released on March 25, 1997, on Up Records. ==Track listing== All tracks by Sam Coomes except "Bird's Eye View" by Janet Weiss and Coomes. # "Ghost Dreaming" – 3:24 # "Ballad of Mechanical Man" – 3:13 # "In the First Place" – 4:02 # "Bird's Eye View" – 3:23 # "Two-Faced" – 2:53 # "Ghost vs. Vampire" – 3:26 # "R&B; Transmogrification" – 2:29 # "When I'm Dead" – 2:20 # "Sugar" – 5:27 # "My Coffin" – 3:59 # "Mama, Papa, Baby" – 2:59 # "Chocolate Rabbit" – 3:24 # "Iron Worm" – 3:18 # "Clouds" – 2:52 == Personnel == *Sam Coomes – vocals, guitars, Roxichord, keyboards *Janet Weiss – vocals, drums *Charlie Campbell – recording engineer, mixing *Quasi – recording engineer, mixing *Tony Lash – mastering ==References== Category:1997 albums Category:Quasi albums
title: R&B Transmogrification
